title: sarva mangaLa
sahitya:
sarva mangaLa rUpADyE sarva saubhAgyapradE

anupallavi

 parvatEndra bAlE bhaktajana paripAlE

caraNam

 dAna darmagaLEdu mariyEnu sahaja niSTaya sAra mariyEnu dInapAl;E nInE gati shrI harikEsha sati
 janana bandha pariharipa jananI ninnanu sEvE kaiyada janiyu bhUmi bhAra vallavE jagadIsha harikEsha vibhavE
